theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: This theory focuses on the IIS pathway and its role in lifespan regulation via DAF-16/FOXO and related molecular mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on IGF1 signaling's conserved role in longevity and genetic regulation of IGF1 levels affecting lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IRS1's role in IIS-mediated aging and lifespan extension, fitting IIS pathway modulation theme.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on conserved IIS pathway, IRS-PI3K-Akt-Foxo axis, and tissue-specific effects on aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights IIS as nutrient-sensing pathway with cell-type-specific effects on lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses conserved IIS hormonal pathway in mammals and its relevance to human longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on insulin receptor and downstream forkhead transcription factors regulating aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IGF1 receptor mutations in centenarians and their impact on IIS and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS pathway regulation of lifespan via FOXO transcription factors and evolutionary conservation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes interplay of DAF-16, SIR-2.1, and cofactors modulating IIS pathway and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling (IIS) Pathway Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains tyraminergic modulation of IIS pathway affecting stress resistance and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Signaling Tradeoff Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on reproductive signaling trade-offs affecting longevity via germline and somatic gonad signals.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes energetic trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance influencing aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes sex differences in senescence due to intra-sexual competition and somatic maintenance trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on early-life nutrition affecting resource allocation trade-offs and aging trajectories.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Classic disposable soma concept emphasizing trade-off between reproduction and somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes resource allocation shifts between reproduction and somatic maintenance affecting longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details evolutionary optimization of resource allocation between reproduction and somatic maintenance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Applies disposable soma trade-off concept to plant senescence and resource allocation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on caloric restriction effects on lifespan via nutrient sensing pathways including IIS and mTOR.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes caloric restriction extending lifespan through metabolic and molecular pathways conserved across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains evolutionary nutrient-sensing adaptations to starvation shaping lifespan extension capacity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Caloric Restriction and Nutrient Sensing Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Proposes metabolic efficiency and fat maintenance as key factors in dietary restriction-induced longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Life-History Trade-Off Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Pace of Life Syndrome integrates life history and physiological traits along a fast-slow continuum, related to resource allocation trade-offs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproductive Aging and Systemic Aging Interconnection Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links reproductive aging (menopause timing) with systemic and brain aging via genetic, molecular, and metabolic pathways.
